instructions.da: Tag afkørslen til venstre mod Destination 1
instructions.en: Take the ramp on the left towards Destination 1

instructions.it: Prendi la rampa a sinistra verso Destination 1

instructions.pl: Weź zjazd po lewej w kierunku Destination 1

instructions.pt-PT: Saia na saída à esquerda em direção a Destination 1

instructions.ru: Поверните налево на съезд в направлении Destination 1
